√arh

present: [1.] árhati etc. V.+  árhate etc. E.+  

perfect: ānṛhús  arhire  

[aorist: arhyāsam  ārhi  ārjihat  ārhīt  arhiṣyati  arhitā  ]

verbal: arháse  

secondary: desiderative: arjihiṣa-   -- causative: arhayati etc. S.+  

derivatives: arghá V.+  -arghya C.  -árha B.+  arhaṇa C.  arrháṇā V.+  arhaṇīya C.
